info.title: Car Registration API
info.description: Car Registration API, An API that retrieves car information from its numberplate in many countries worldwide, uncluding the USA, UK, India, Australia and most of Europe. A username and password is required to access the API, which can be obtained from www.carregistrationapi.com - Use https://www.regcheck.org.uk/api/json.aspx/ as the root of all API calls.

get.summary: Gets details of a UK Vehicle
get.description: Gets details of a UK Vehicle
